Token.Abstract: Objects acting as the delegate for RKMappingOperation objects must adopt the RKMappingOperationDelegate protocol. These methods enable the delegate to be notified of events such as the application of attribute and relationship mappings during a mapping operation.
Tells the delegate that an attribute or relationship mapping was found for a given key path within the data being mapped.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value that was found at the given key path in the source object representation.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the source object for which the mapping is to be applied.

Parameter.Name: propertyMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKAttributeMapping or RKRelationshipMapping for which the mappable value was found within the source object representation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that no attribute or relationships mapping was found for a given key path within the data being mapped.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the source object for which no mappable value was found.

Parameter.Name: propertyMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKAttributeMapping or RKRelationshipMapping for which no mappable value could be found within the source object representation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has set a value for a given key path with an attribute or relationship mapping.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: A new value that was set on the destination object.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the destination object for which a new value has been set.

Parameter.Name: propertyMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKAttributeMapping or RKRelationshipMapping found for the key path.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has declined to set a value for a given key path because the value has not changed.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: A unchanged value for the key path in the destination object.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the destination object for which a unchanged value was not set.

Parameter.Name: propertyMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKAttributeMapping or RKRelationshipMapping found for the key path.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has failed due to an error.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation that has failed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object indicating the reason for the failure.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has selected a concrete object mapping with which to map the source object.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation.

Parameter.Name: objectMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The concrete object mapping with which to perform the mapping.

Parameter.Name: dynamicMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The dynamic source mapping from which the object mapping was determined.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has connected a relationship.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation.

Parameter.Name: relationship
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship that was connected.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The value that was connected to the relationship

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object describing how the relationship was to be connected.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation failed to connect a relationship.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation.

Parameter.Name: relationship
Parameter.Abstract: The relationship that was connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection object describing how the relationship was to be connected.
